price: Katakanlah, "Kalau seandainya kamu menguasai perbendaharaan-perbendaharaan rahmat Tuhan-ku, niscaya perbendaharaan itu kamu tahan karena takut membelanjakannya".  Dan adalah manusia itu sangat kikir.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنتُمۡ تَمۡلِكُونَ خَزَآئِنَ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّأَمۡسَكۡتُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ ٱلۡإِنفَاقِۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ قَتُورٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law antum tamlikūna khazāina raḥmati rabbī idhan la-amsaktum khashyata al-infāqi wakāna al-insānu qatūran
